title: DiRT 4 (2017) PC | RePack xatab

Description:

DiRT 4 players expect a new revolutionary mode Your Stage, in which you can create an infinite number of unique tracks, with the click of a button - just select the locations and characteristics of the route, and the game engine will do everything for you - will create a unique level for your parameters. You can create simple trails for training or rather technically challenging to challenge your friends: who will quickly pass it on time. The game will retain the same level of realism DiRT Rally, combining it with all the best sides and the game engine DiRT 2 and DiRT 3.
